trans-unit.source: Represents a user or group account.
trans-unit.target: 表示用户或组帐户。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> class by using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>使用指定的名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The specified name is not required to correspond to an existing account or group, but translation into other <xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference>-derived types will not be possible unless the account or group does exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的名称不需要对应于现有帐户或组，但是转换到其他<xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference>-派生的类型可能才会存在的帐户或组。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference>

trans-unit.source: The name used to create the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 用来创建的名称<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不能为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: name is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: name为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or- name is too long.
trans-unit.target: -或-name太长。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> class by using the specified domain name and account name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>通过使用指定的域的名称和帐户名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The specified domain and account names are not required to correspond to an existing account or group, but translation into other <xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference>-derived types will not be possible unless the account or group does exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的域和帐户名称不需要对应于现有帐户或组，但是转换到其他<xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference>-派生的类型可能才会存在的帐户或组。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference>

trans-unit.source: The name of the domain.
trans-unit.target: 域的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Domain names that are null values are treated like an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串来处理 null 值的域名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the account.
trans-unit.target: 帐户的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不能为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: accountName is .
trans-unit.target: accountNameis .

trans-unit.source: accountName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: accountName为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or- accountName is too long.
trans-unit.target: -或-accountName太长。

trans-unit.source: -or- domainName is too long.
trans-unit.target: -或-domainName太长。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象是否等于指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要与此比较的对象<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if o is an object with the same underlying type and value as this object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 o 具有相同的对象基础类型和值与此对象; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the current <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 用作当前的哈希函数<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method is suitable for hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 方法适合于哈希算法和数据哈希表之类的结构。

trans-unit.source: A hash value for the current <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前的哈希值<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is a valid translation type for the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的类型是否是有效的转换类型<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: if targetType is a valid translation type for the class; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果 targetType 是的有效转换类型类; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> objects to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: They are considered equal if they have the same canonical name representation as the one returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.Value*> property or if they are both <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们具有与返回相同的规范名称表示它们被视为相等<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.Value*>属性或如果它们都<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The left operand to use for the equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于相等性比较的左的操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The right operand to use for the equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于相等性比较的右操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if left and right are equal; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: if left and right are equal; otherwise .

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> objects to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象以确定它们是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: They are considered not equal if they have different canonical name representations than the one returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.Value*> property or if one of the objects is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and the other is not.
trans-unit.target: 它们将被视为不相等如果它们具有不同的规范名称表示形式返回比<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.Value*>属性或如果其中一个对象是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ，另一个不是。</xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The left operand to use for the inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于不相等比较的左的操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The right operand to use for the inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于不相等比较的右操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if left and right are not equal; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: if left and right are not equal; otherwise .

trans-unit.source: Returns the account name, in *Domain* **\\** *Account* format, for the account represented by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回中的帐户名称，*域* ** \\ ** *帐户*格式表示的帐户为<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The account name, in *Domain* **\\** *Account* format.
trans-unit.target: 帐户名称，在*域* ** \\ ** *帐户*格式。

trans-unit.source: Translates the account name represented by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object into another <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>-derived type.
trans-unit.target: 将转换所表示的帐户名称<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>到另一个对象<xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>-派生类型。

trans-unit.source: The target type for the conversion from <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从转换的目标类型<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The target type must be a type that is considered valid by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.IsValidTargetType*> method.
trans-unit.target: 目标类型必须是类型被视为有效<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.IsValidTargetType*>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.IsValidTargetType*>

trans-unit.source: The converted identity.
trans-unit.target: 转换后的标识。

trans-unit.source: targetType is .
trans-unit.target: targetType is .

trans-unit.source: targetType is not an type.
trans-unit.target: targetType 不是类型。

trans-unit.source: Some or all identity references could not be translated.
trans-unit.target: 无法转换某些或所有标识引用。

trans-unit.source: The source account name is too long.
trans-unit.target: 源帐户名称过长。

trans-unit.source: -or- A Win32 error code was returned.
trans-unit.target: -或者-返回了 Win32 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns an uppercase string representation of this <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此大写的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The uppercase string representation of this <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 大写的字符串表示形式这<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>对象。
